pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Gentle Scent Lotion Nourishing Coconut 354mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Skin Relief Body Lotion Nourish Coconut 354mL

AVEENO® Skin Relief Gentle Scent Lotion Nourishing Coconut relieves itchy, extra-dry skin.
As gentle as the fragrance free lotion, this lightly scented coconut body lotion soothes very dry, itchy skin and moisturises for a full 24 hours. Dermatologist tested, the rich moisturiser formula is fast absorbing for skin that looks and feels healthier.


  • Gentle enough for dry, sensitive skin.

  • Clinically shown to help relieve itchy, extra-dry skin.

  • Non greasy

  • Moisturises for a full 24 hours

  • Dye-free and allergy tested (hypoallergenic)

  • Contains dimethicone skin protectant and colloidal oatmeal to protect and moisturise the skin



Also try Aveeno Skin Relief Gentle Scents Nourishing Coconut Wash, specifically formulated for dry, sensitive skin.

Aveeno Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty.


  • Essential Active Naturals.

  • Triple Oat Complex.

  • Dermatologist recommended brand.



Uses: Helps temporarily protect chafed, chapped, or cracked skin.

Size: 354mL

Shelf Life in Days: 700 days

KEY FEATURES

• Gentle Scent Lotion- Nourishing Coconut
• As Gentle As Fragrance Free
• Dermatologist Recommended Brand
• Triple Oat Complex








Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Benzyl Alcohol, Chlorphenesin, Steareth-2, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylene Brassylate, Gamma-Nonalactone, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Chloride, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Potassium Sorbate.

Directions

Apply on skin as needed. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.
